State of Virginia
Town of Danville To Wit

This day personally appeared before me W T Clark Mayor and as such Presiding Juctice of the Hastings Court for the Town and State aforesaid which being a Court of Record in aforesaid Town & State. T S Davidson who made Oath that he would well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his station as Commissioner of Deeds &c under and by virtue of the Laws of the State of Kentucky as approved Jany 7th 18452,
In Testimony whereof he the said T S Davidson has hereunto affixed his hand this the 11th day of Nov 1865 v

State of Virginia
Town of Danville To Wit

Sworn to before me W T Clarke Mayor and as such Presiding Magistrate of the Court of Hastings for the Town of Danville & State aforesaid In testimony whereof I have hereunto affixed my hand this the 11th day of Nov 1865
Will T Clark Mayor of Danville

Comr Deeds
Virginia
Oath of Thos S. Davidson

21st Nov/65
